price: 6. par miséricorde de ton Seigneur, Lui Qui Entend tout et Lui l’Omniscient,
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
